  • Other Projects

Since Freedoom is free, some other projects have used Freedoom's assets. We think this is a great use of the project and should be encouraged. Here are the ones that we know about. If you find any others, please let us know by filing an issue or pull request on the website project at GitHub.

  • Barista

  • Doominator Wave Survival

  • Freedoom for Android

  • Gloomy Dungeons

  • Nocturne In Yellow

  • Omega Point

  • Terrorized

  • Zombie Panic
